item.description:
Please join us for the April Chai Tech Wednesdays. This month it's at Lir and we had over 50 people the last time it was at Lir! Don't miss the April event.

Chai Tech Wednesdays is a large gathering of Boston's entrepreneurial and hi-tech types in Boston's Jewish community. This is a free monthly meetup that is all about connecting people!

6:30- 7:00 Open Networking
7:00- 7:30 Individual Introductions and Networking Goals
7:30- 8:30 Open Networking
------------

Chai Tech Wednesdays is a free monthly networking event sponsored by CJP's Technology Industry Group. CJP is Boston's Jewish Federation, which works to care for people in need, to preserve Jewish learning and to enrich Jewish culture worldwide. To learn more, contact Larry Tobin at larryt@cjp.org or visit www.cjp.org.

------------
Find us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.c...
item.name: April Chai Tech Wednesdays
